com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Annotation
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.BasePointCollection
        • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    Deprecated. 
    As of 7.0.0, use Mapbox Annotation Plugin instead

    @Deprecated
public final class Polygon
extends BasePointCollection
    Polygon is a geometry annotation that's a closed loop of coordinates.

      • setHoles

        public void setHoles(@NonNull
                     java.util.List<? extends java.util.List<LatLng>> holes)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the holes of this polygon. This method will take a copy of the holes, so further mutations to holes will have no effect on this polygon.
        Parameters:
        holes - A List of List of LatLng points making up the holes.
